result.execSummary:
The defendant Little Wolf Traveling Thunder Lemieux was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Criminal Trespass to Dwelling [Modifiers: Party to a Crime, Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.14.
  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: Party to a Crime, Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Ashland County Clerk of Circuit Court

miscConds.notes:
While on supervision the Def is to pay their financial obligations thru the Clerk of Court, which may include payments on restitution, fines, costs, surcharges, etc that are court ordered.
The payments are to be paid directly to the Clerk of Court Office at:
Ashland Co Clerk of Circuit Court
201 Main Street West - Room 307
Ashland, WI  54806
Def placed on a pymt plan of $25/mo beginning 1 month of release & after 4 mos of release pymts to increase to $40/mo.
To seek, obtain and maintain full time employment/full time schooling or a combination of the two.

Defendant is to undergo counseling for criminal thinking through a Cognitive-Thinking for Change therapy program.
  The Defendant is to obtain counseling as directed by DOC at the expense of the Defendant.
  Defendant shall not possess or consume alcoholic beverages, illegal drugs, or any mind altering substances (MAS).  MAS means alcoholic beverages, controlled substances other than those prescribed by treating physician to the Defendant, inhalants, synthetic marijuana or a similar substance, and/or over-the-counter medications used contrary to label instructions.  THE DEFENDANT IS TO MAINTAIN ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
The Defendant shall not enter any bars, taverns, liquor stores (any place where the primary purpose is the sale of alcohol) where mind altering substances are present, consumed or sold..
  The Def is to take all medications as prescribed by treating physician and only in the manner & dosage as prescribed!
  The Defendant is subject to random UA testing.
Def to have NO contact w/Robert Allen, Brandon Tolliver, Marcal Long, A.B. & R.F. (minors).
Restitution is set at -0-.  If during the period of supervision, a claim for restitution is made the Def will be notified!

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

supervisions.notes:
Defendant is granted credit for time served as calculated by the Ashland County Sheriff's Department
Concurrent with: Count2 in 15CF74, 13CF161,14CF163 and 15CF109 but CONSECUTIVE to 14CF199

superMiscConds.notes:
Defendant shall not possess/consume alcoholic beverages, illegal drugs, drug paraphernalia or any mind altering substances (MAS).  MAS means alcoholic beverages, controlled substances other than those prescribed by treating physician to the Def & taken only as prescribed, inhalants, synthetic marijuana or a similar substance, and/or over-the-counter medications used contrary to label instructions.  THE DEFENDANT IS TO MAINTAIN ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
The Defendant shall not enter any bars, taverns, liquor stores (any place where the primary purpose is the sale of alcohol) where mind altering substances are possessed or consumed.
  The Def is subject to random UA testing.
NO CONTACT WITH CHARLES CHARETTE
NO CONTACT WITH BRANDON TOLLIVER
NO CONTACT WITH ROBERT ALLEN
NO CONTACT WITH MARCAL LONG
NO CONTACT WITH R.F.
NO CONTACT WITH A.B.
NO CONTACT WITH H.P.
Undergo alcohol/drug assessment and complete recommended treatment-responsible for finding the funding for any treatment/counseling recommended.

supervisions.notes:
If def is placed on probation or extended supervision & owes financial obligations ordered by the Court at the time of discharge, a civil judgment may be entered against the def for all unpaid financial obligations.

AMENDED 12/13/16 DEFENDANT IS PLACED ON EXTENDED SUPERVISION FOR 10 MONTHS.
Concurrent with: Count 2 in 15CF74, 13CF161,14CF163 and 15CF109 but CONSECUTIVE to 14CF199

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Little Wolf Traveling Thunder Lemieux in court with attorney S. Joseph Randtke.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. STC 15CM204 and 15CF235. Sentencing after Revocation on 13CF161,14CF163,14CF199,15CF74 and 15CF109. State has complied with victim rights. ADA no agreement on sentencing. Def mother makes a statement.  ADA parties have discussed, no agreement. ADA has submitted State's recommendation is outlined in attached document. 
Atty Randtke, comments on Revocation Order and Warrant and 2 cases make def ineligible for programming request to restructure so that def is eligible for programming. 
Ct sentences def (see attached). Ct advises written explaination of determinate sentence.
State's Recommendation for Sentencing After Revocation

Defendant Little Wolf Traveling Thunder Lemieux appeared by video means. Prosecuting Atty Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for State of Wisconsin. Attorney S. Joseph Randtke in court for Defendant Little Wolf Traveling Thunder Lemieux. Cases 15CM204,15CF74,109,235, 14CF161,163,199 and 13CF161. Atty Randtke other cases should be resolved shortly, asks for trial date on 15CF235. 15CF235 day JT 12/1 and 12/2. Final pretrial conference 11/21 1:15pm.  
SEHR cases 13CF61,14CF161,163,199,15CF109,74 8/30 4pm(other cases tracking)

Defendant Little Wolf Traveling Thunder Lemieux appeared by video means. Prosecuting Atty Kelly J Mcknight appeared for State of Wisconsin. Atty Radtke appointed today and has not spoken with the him yet, asks for STC all cases. JA to send atty copy of each complaint  Status conference scheduled for August 24, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
evidence reciept, money applied to financials per Judge's order

Defendant Little Wolf Traveling Thunder Lemieux appeared by video means. Prosecuting Atty Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for State of Wisconsin. No atty appointed yet, trial scheduled for 6/16-17 adjourned.  Status conference scheduled for June 20, 2016 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Little Wolf Traveling Thunder Lemieux in court by video with attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann appr in person.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Hoffmann request another date  Status conference scheduled for May 12, 2016 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Little Wolf Traveling Thunder Lemieux by video in court with attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann appr in person.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Hoffmann, offer made this morning, needs to talk to client, ask for hearing next Monday  Status conference scheduled for May 2, 2016 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Little Wolf Traveling Thunder Lemieux in court with attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann.  Defendant Little Wolf Traveling Thunder Lemieux in custody.  R Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  No agreemt, would like to settle SEHR cases only 1st per Hoffmann & feels credit for time served is not agreed upon.  15 CF 235} JT set for 2 days - June 16 & 17, 2016 @ 9:00 am.  STC - all cases 4/25 @ 1:15 pm  - open misd case track along.  Status conference scheduled for April 25, 2016 at 01:15 pm.
